nodes.text: Lohjoy was a female Ho'Din engineer who served aboard the starship Omen in 5000 BBY, at the onset of the Great Hyperspace War fought between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During that year, while the Sith dreadnaughts Omen and Harbinger were carrying lightsaber-amplifying Lignan crystals to Sith Lord Naga Sadow, the two ships were ambushed by a Jedi starfighter over the Outer Rim planet Phaegon III. While Lohjoy was transmitting a hologram to Omen's commander, Yaru Korsin, an explosion in the starship caused her snake-like Ho'Din hair to catch on fire; she was subsequently killed by a hull breach.
Commander Korsin described Lohjoy as honest and cautious.
Lohjoy made a brief appearance in the eBook Lost Tribe of the Sith: Precipice, written by John Jackson Miller and released on May 28, 2009.
